page.title: 05 SUPERNATURAL LOCAL LEGENDS
page.content: There are countless tales of witches and ghosts around lancashire.One of our churches,St.Mary's,which is several centuries old,is said to have a buried witch.Over the grave is an iron cage to prevent its spirit escaping. Another story about a local building, not far from our school,is about the Penwortham Hall Maid.One night a local man was met by a girl after getting off a bus.They started talking together,and she accompanied him home.As he turned to say"Thank you",and bid her good night,she vanished.He was astonished and wanted to find out about this ghostly meeting.After much investigation,he discovered that a maid from Penwortham Hall had died there long ago.From then on,he has claimed to have witnessed the return of the Penwortham Hall Maid.
